title: Influence of Big Data in the Healthcare Sector
abstract: The increase in availability and growth rate of bio-medical information known as "big data" enables a vast range of opportunities of improvement to the healthcare sector both clinical and research. The opportunities presented by the availability of this big data are gateway to the evolution of healthcare industry. This will create a paradigm shift which will change the way this industry works i.e. from disease based diagnostics to patient based diagnostics. Current developments in IT in the field of biomedicine have changed the way the privacy of personal information is viewed with users being able to have more control over their data i.e. their health records. Data mining techniques and analytics are already affecting the way the healthcare decisions are made. In this paper we will discuss the technological advancements of big data in healthcare sector and its effect on the betterment of the sector, its challenges and the opportunities provided and their contribution to the revolution of healthcare sector.
